text: We are apt to forget that children watch examples better than they listen to preaching.
author: Roy L. Smith

text: Most children threaten at times to run away from home. This is the only thing that keeps some parents going.
author: Phyllis Diller

text: Telling a teenager the facts of life is like giving a fish a bath.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

text: Few things are more satisfying than seeing your children have teenagers of their own.
author: Doug Larson

text: Most American children suffer too much mother and too little father.
author: Gloria Steinem
